message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I think it would be a great fit for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm looking to save some money here.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $115? That's a significant discount from my original price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm really trying to stay under budget.
